title: Large-Scale Teacher Competency Enhancement Design for Improving Online Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Experience Using Basic Online Learning Tools (e.g., Google Forms) and Understanding of Secondary Education Systems
context.additional_context: Simulation-based curriculum for university students to assume teaching roles and cultivate online language lesson design competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three survey tools for measuring online learning effectiveness.
Learners can propose one online lesson design framework suitable for language education.
Learners can identify at least three factors hindering teachers' adaptation to online learning and suggest improvements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
